title: Since Karma cannot get her fans back
body: Could we get a new fan using champion? Preferably a classy feminine one, but at this point I will take what I can get.

replies.body: I always hope they bring back old Karma but as a new champ, like have her be Karma's sister or something. That way, it's to honor old Karma with her fans and her duality kit. We also haven't had a sibling champs in awhile since Draven and Darius.
